head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir ¶ , ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the ¶ ¶ two months ¶ ¶ ending ¶ ...

div.p: Y83/7221, unit 1411, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the
two months ending 31st August1883.

cell.style: border: 0.0069in solid #000000; padding-top: 0in; padding-left: 0.075in; padding-bottom: 0in; padding-right: 0.075in;

note.p: There isa ✓ against each amount in the 'Particulars of Vote' section.
